content: Hi David have you coded clinFHIR so that if I'm on a webinar using it - it won't respond? seriously can not get the LM to edit or add elements. I recall this working seamlessly before
Will take a look. Are you logged in?
apologies eric - accidentally pasted in some test during some debugging - should be fixed now...

btw - were you giving a webinar when it failed? Double apologies if so. Is this going to be a regular occurrence? If so, then maybe a more robust release procedure is needed (right now I just update whenever I make significant changes)...

I was being glib. It wasn't a planned event at all and I just wanted to noodle on clinfhir during an OO on FHIR call to be able to visually represent a discussion point. Thanks for the offer though- I'll keep that in mind.
